violations.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
violations.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.83:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0051c3, surrounding text: #313131)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

violations.description: Ensure <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
violations.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  <meta> tag forces timed refresh of page (less than 20 hours)
